docstring: Adds a summary to the model instance.
code_content:
def add_summary(
    self, summary: str
) -> Union[
    "BaseModelBuilder",
    "ModuleModelBuilder",
    "ClassModelBuilder",
    "FunctionModelBuilder",
]:
    """Adds a summary to the model instance."""
    self.common_attributes.summary = summary
    # print(f"Added summary to {self.common_attributes.id}")
    return self
